about_me: Senior COBOL Developer with 12 years of experience in financial services. Experienced in all phases of the software development life cycle (SDLC). Strong problem solving, communication, and analytical skills. Excellent skills in technologies COBOL, Java, CICS, JCL, CL, RPGLE, SQL, DB2, Mainframe, AS400.

experiences.shortDesc: Consulting service for information technology department at Prudential Assurance Singapore
Implemented system improvements for core insurance software with COBOL on AS400 / iSeries in various departments including New Business, Policy Services, Contract Billing, Claim, and Finance.
Staffing companies for information technology department at AVIVA ASIA PTE LTD Singapore, a multinational insurance and investment service corporation.
Staffing company for information technology department at GREAT EASTERN LIFE, a multinational finance and insurance corporation.
Provided maintenance to enhance core insurance and core banking software systems for various clients.
